snippet: Hurricane Sandy was logged as Category 1 — the weakest — but that did not take account of the low pressure that increased the size of its storm surge and widened its impact.
lead_paragraph: Hurricane Sandy was logged as Category 1 — the weakest — but that did not take account of the low pressure that increased the size of its storm surge and widened its impact.

headline.main: A Call to Rethink Storm Classification
headline.print_headline: A Call to Rethink Storm Classification
